verses.verse: When you <S%H3427>sit<s%> to <S%H3898>eat<s%> with a <S%H4910>ruler,<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H995>diligently<s%> what is before <S%H6440>you;<s%>
<S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7915>knife<s%> to your <S%H3930>throat,<s%> if you are a man <S%H1167>given<s%> to <S%H5315>appetite.<s%>
<S%H183>Don't<s%> be desirous of his <S%H4303>dainties,<s%> since they are <S%H3577>deceitful<s%> <S%H3899>food.<s%>
<S%H3021>Don't<s%> weary yourself to be <S%H6238>rich.<s%> In your <S%H998>wisdom,<s%> show <S%H2308>restraint.<s%>

Why do you <S%H5774>set<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on that which is <S%H6213>not?<s%> For it certainly <S%H6213>sprouts<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> like an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> and <S%H5774>flies<s%> in the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>
<S%H3898>Don't<s%> eat the <S%H3899>food<s%> of him who has a <S%H7451>stingy<s%> <S%H5869>eye,<s%> and <S%H183>don't<s%> crave his <S%H4303>delicacies:<s%>
for as he <S%H8176>thinks<s%> <S%H5315>about<s%> the <S%H398>cost,<s%> so he is. "Eat and <S%H8354>drink!<s%>" he <S%H559>says<s%> to <S%H3820>you,<s%> but his heart is not with you.
The <S%H6595>morsel<s%> which you have <S%H398>eaten<s%> you shall vomit <S%H6958>up,<s%> and <S%H7843>lose<s%> your <S%H5273>good<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>
<S%H1696>Don't<s%> speak in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool,<s%> for he will <S%H936>despise<s%> the <S%H7922>wisdom<s%> of your <S%H4405>words.<s%>
<S%H5253>Don't<s%> move the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> boundary <S%H1366>stone.<s%> <S%H935>Don't<s%> encroach on the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless:<s%>
for their <S%H1350>Defender<s%> is <S%H2389>strong.<s%> He will <S%H7378>plead<s%> their case against <S%H7379>you.<s%>
<S%H935>Apply<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and your <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
<S%H4513>Don't<s%> withhold <S%H4148>correction<s%> from a <S%H5288>child.<s%> If you <S%H5221>punish<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> he will not <S%H4191>die.<s%>
<S%H5221>Punish<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and <S%H5337>save<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> if your <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2449>wise,<s%> then my <S%H3820>heart<s%> will be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> even <S%H589>mine:<s%>
<S%H3629>yes,<s%> my heart will <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> when your <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> what is <S%H4339>right.<s%>
<S%H3820>Don't<s%> let your heart <S%H7065>envy<s%> <S%H2400>sinners;<s%> but rather <S%H3374>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long.<s%>
Indeed surely there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H319>future<s%> <S%H8615>hope,<s%> and your hope will not be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
<S%H8085>Listen,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> and <S%H833>keep<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> on the right <S%H1870>path!<s%>
<S%H3196>Don't<s%> be among ones drinking too much <S%H2151>wine,<s%> or those who gorge themselves on <S%H1320>meat:<s%>
for the <S%H5433>drunkard<s%> and the <S%H2151>glutton<s%> shall become <S%H3423>poor;<s%> and <S%H5124>drowsiness<s%> <S%H3847>clothes<s%> them in <S%H7168>rags.<s%>
<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to your <S%H1>father<s%> who gave you <S%H3205>life,<s%> and <S%H936>don't<s%> despise your <S%H517>mother<s%> when she is <S%H2204>old.<s%>
<S%H7069>Buy<s%> the <S%H571>truth,<s%> and <S%H4376>don't<s%> sell <S%H2451>it.<s%> Get wisdom, <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> and <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
The <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> has <S%H1524>great<s%> <S%H1523>joy.<s%> Whoever <S%H3205>fathers<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> child delights in <S%H8055>him.<s%>
Let your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H517>mother<s%> be <S%H8055>glad!<s%> Let her who <S%H3205>bore<s%> you <S%H1523>rejoice!<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me your <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7521>keep<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For a <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>pit;<s%> and a wayward <S%H5237>wife<s%> is a <S%H6862>narrow<s%> <S%H875>well.<s%>
<S%H693>Yes,<s%> she lies in wait like a <S%H2863>robber,<s%> and <S%H3254>increases<s%> the <S%H898>unfaithful<s%> among <S%H120>men.<s%>

Who has <S%H188>woe?<s%> Who has <S%H17>sorrow?<s%> Who has <S%H4079>strife?<s%> Who has <S%H7879>complaints?<s%> Who has <S%H2600>needless<s%> <S%H6482>bruises?<s%> Who has <S%H2448>bloodshot<s%> <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>
Those who stay <S%H309>long<s%> at the <S%H3196>wine;<s%> those who <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H2713>seek<s%> out mixed <S%H4469>wine.<s%>
<S%H7200>Don't<s%> look at the <S%H3196>wine<s%> when it is <S%H119>red,<s%> when <S%H5414>it<s%> <S%H5869>sparkles<s%> in the <S%H3563>cup,<s%> when it <S%H1980>goes<s%> down <S%H4339>smoothly.<s%>
In the <S%H319>end,<s%> it <S%H5391>bites<s%> like a <S%H5175>snake,<s%> and <S%H6567>poisons<s%> like a <S%H6848>viper.<s%>
Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> strange <S%H2114>things,<s%> and your <S%H3820>mind<s%> will <S%H1696>imagine<s%> confusing <S%H8419>things.<s%>
<S%H7901>Yes,<s%> you will be as he who lies down in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> or as he who <S%H7901>lies<s%> on <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2260>rigging:<s%>

"They <S%H5221>hit<s%> <S%H2470>me,<s%> and I was not hurt! They <S%H1986>beat<s%> <S%H3045>me,<s%> and I don't feel <S%H6974>it!<s%> When will I wake <S%H1245>up?<s%> I can do it again. I can find <S%H3254>another.<s%>"
